description: Speaking at the inauguration of the Annual Meeting of the African Development Bank, Prime Minister Narendra Modi expounded about India’s strong ties with Africa. Shri Modi said that Government
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Addressed the Annual Meetings of the African Development Bank Group. Highlighted the strong ties between India & Africa and the infinite avenues of cooperation between us. 

Since our Government assumed office, strengthening of ties with Africa has been a priority & we have achieved remarkable progress in that. Emphasised on India-Africa links be it in energy, culture, education, IT & other areas which illustrate our dynamic & vibrant relationship. 

India-Africa economic ties are getting better & this isn’t confined to Governments only. The role of private sector is also noteworthy. Also shared insights of how Government of India’s ‘reform to transform’ approach is bringing desired results & positively impacting lives. http://nm-4.com/qcw4
